title: Intermediate dimensions of compact subsets of the real line
abstract:
Given a positive, non-increasing sequence $a$ with a finite sum $L$, we
consider all the closed subsets of $[0,L]$ such that the lengths of their
complementary open intervals are a rearrangement of the sequence $a$. We study
all possible $\theta$-intermediate dimensions for these sets and show that,
under some assumptions, it is an interval.
